long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scouring the web for resources and don't want to clutter your browser tabs? Pin it! Whether it's text or a browser tab, Let Me Pin It! allows you to save it for reference later. A simple and straightforward way to save notes and URL's you come across. 

Students can benefit from pinning multiple tabs and jotting down notes within the extension.

Recruiters can effectively save LinkedIn URL's to compile a pool of candidates to review. 

Have an event coming up and need to group ideas together? Save your notes and URL's all in one place.
